page.shortlink: api client api a5 audio recorder save method

argument.name: fileName
argument.description: The file name to use when saving. This excludes the file extention. If no file name is passed in, a file name will be automatically gerneated that includes the date, time and length of the recording.

page.description: Stop the current recording and save the resulting file. The file will be saved as a "*.M4A".
